title: Shatter - 1974 [Hammer Films and Shaw Brothers] Hong Kong action
description:
Shatter (1974 - Hong Kong, UK)                           aka Call Him Mr. Shatter

Action / Drama

starring . . . . Stuart Whitman, Lung Ti, Lily Li, Peter Cushing
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0074268/


Hammer Films and Shaw Brothers Production Companies

Filmed at Kai Tak Airport, Kowloon City, Kowloon, Hong Kong, China

Shatter is one of the world's top assassins. After killing an African dictator, he travels to Hong Kong to collect his fee, but instead finds himself a hunted man. Shatter hates being screwed out of his hard-earned cash, so he sets about getting revenge against the crimelord who crossed him. Along the way, he gains a young martial artist as an ally, hooks up with a sexy Chinese woman, and annoys a British Intelligence officer.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 698x548, 25.000 fps, 1961 Kbps, 01h30m21s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps
